About

Hello!

My name is Marek Fajkus. I was born in 1990 in Brno, Czech Republic, where I also currently live again. I'm writing software mostly for web even it isn't the only area I'm interested in. Currently I'm working for London based company [GlobalWebIndex](https://globalwebindex.net) as a part of team responsible for flagship product - both frontend single-page application and JSON APIs. I'm interested in functional programming, security and programming languages in general. I also enjoy studing and solving non-trivial problems. I like music, beer and freedom.

Contacts

I spend most of my day on GitHub and Twitter. In case you want to say hi or spam me I'm using email marek.faj[\at]gmail.com
Please do not spam me:
